Total_Focus.help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

Power_Bolt.help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.
Power_Bolt.targetHelp: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.

Power_Blast.help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.
Power_Blast.targetHelp: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.

Explosive_Blast.help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.
Explosive_Blast.targetHelp: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

Dull_Pain.help: A Crey Cloned Hero can activate this power to increase his maximum Hit Points for a short time.
Dull_Pain.targetHelp: A Crey Cloned Hero can activate this power to increase his maximum Hit Points for a short time.

Moment_of_Glory.help: When you activate this power, you lose almost all of your Hit Points and can no longer Regenerate Hit Points, However, you become Resistant to all damage types except Psionics, recover Endurance more quickly, and are highly resistant to Sleep, Disorient, Immobilization, and Hold effects. Recharge: Very Long
Moment_of_Glory.attackerHit: You lose most of your Hit Points, but are now practically invincible.
